error.message: Parameter $domain_loader of method Drupal\domain_lang\DomainLangHandler::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\domain\DomainLoaderInterface.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to domain_lang.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
